root.Summary: 1: Maiques-Diaz A, Hernando M, Sánchez-López A, Rio-Machin A, Shrestha M, Mulloy JC, Cigudosa JC, Alvarez S. MAPK8-mediated stabilization of SP1 is essential for RUNX1-RUNX1T1 - driven leukaemia. Br J Haematol. 2015 Jun 8. doi:10.1111/bjh.13536. [Epub ahead of print] PubMed PMID: 26058961.
